org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

Interface RestFacade


  • public interface RestFacade
    Unified client facade API to perform REST operations of various APIs through a single interface.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get already initialized underlying API specific client instance to work with.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        <T> PayloadRequest<T> newInstance(@Nonnull
                                Class<T> resource)
        Create a new in memory resource instance of requested type.

        Note: Based on the concrete implementation of the resource it may result in a remote call in order to get a more specific resource instance. Either created locally with 'new' operator or based on the implementation a remote call might be executed to get a 'new' instance initialized with default values and given parameters if any.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance PayloadRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to create
        Returns:
        the fluent action for consequent configurations
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • upload

        <T> UploadMediaProvider<T> upload(@Nonnull
                                T resource)
        Upload a media and related metadata represented by given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource that acts as a metadata to be inserted or updated
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will let you provide and configure a media to be uploaded
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • download

        <T> DownloadMediaProvider download(@Nonnull
                                 Class<T> resource)
        Download a media for given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the type of the resource to download
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will download requested type
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • get

        <T> SingleRetrievalIdentification<T> get(@Nonnull
                                       Class<T> resource)
        Retrieve a resource instance of requested type and identifier.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance RetrievalRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to get
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will return concrete resource instance for given type and identifier, otherwise returns null
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • list

        <T> ListRetrievalRequest<T> list(@Nonnull
                               Class<T> resource)
        Find the list of resource instance of given type and filtering criteria.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance ListRetrievalRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to find
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will return list of resource instance matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • list

        <T> ListRetrievalRequest<T> list(@Nonnull
                               Class<T> resource,
                               @Nullable
                               Identifier parent)
        Find the list of resource instance of given type and filtering criteria.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance ListRetrievalRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to find
        parent - the unique identifier of the parent resource as an owner of given resource if any
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will return list of resource instance matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • insert

        <T> PayloadRequest<T> insert(@Nonnull
                           T resource)
        Insert a resource instance.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance PayloadRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type to insert
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will return newly inserted instance
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • insert

        <T> PayloadRequest<T> insert(@Nonnull
                           T resource,
                           @Nullable
                           Identifier parent)
        Insert a resource instance.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance PayloadRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type to insert
        parent - the resource parent identifier
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will return newly inserted instance
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • update

        <T> UpdateIdentification<T> update(@Nonnull
                                 T resource)
        Update the given resource instance.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance PayloadRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource instance of concrete type
        Returns:
        the fluent action, consequent call will return updated instance
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - a runtime exception wrapping all REST (status code) related exceptions

      • delete

        <T> DeleteIdentification<T> delete(@Nonnull
                                 Class<T> resource)
        Remove the resource type for given identifier.

        Note: the remote call itself will be executed by request instance SimpleRequest with possibility to provide optional parameters or locale.

        Parameters:
        resource - the type of resource to remove
        Returns:
        the fluent action
        Throws:
        HttpFailureException - if not matching request URI has found

      • client

        <C> C client(@Nonnull
           Class<C> type)
        Get already initialized underlying API specific client instance to work with.
        Parameters:
        type - the concrete class type of the underlying client
        Returns:
        the underlying client instance
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if unknown client type has been requested
